meanings.definition: A machine for quickly writing in shorthand.
meanings.sent1: The stenotype helped the court reporter take notes efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The stenotype is commonly used in legal proceedings.
meanings.sent3: During the trial, the stenotype and the typewriter had a race - the stenotype won!
meanings.sent4: Her fingers danced on the stenotype keys, capturing every word like magic.
meanings.sent5: The stenotype hummed softly as it transcribed the spoken words into text.

meanings.definition: To write in shorthand using a stenotype machine.
meanings.sent1: She learned to stenotype to keep up with the fast-paced dictation.
meanings.sent2: He stenotypes all his notes during lectures to save time.
meanings.sent3: The detective stenotyped the suspect's confession in record time.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers flew across the stenotype keys, capturing every detail effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: Stenotyping requires practice to become proficient at transcribing quickly.
